summary: Nekros is a powerful wizzard that has been outcast from his homefor his practice in necromancy. His hunger for power has lead him to a small Forgotten Crypt in Skyrim that is said to hold powerful spell tomes capable of unleashing the souls of mythical beasts.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod i have made for skyrim featuring a small dungeon populated mainly by draugor with boss fights throughout. It features working ambushes and is radient quest ready, it also has a reward for magic charecters allowing you to sumon larger and more powerful \"Epic\" creatures to fight for you. 

It is located in Falkreath hold and should appear on you map, a screenshot shows of its location.

Please rate, subscribe and leave feedback if you like this mod or have had any issues or have any suggestions.
I may update it slightly in the future.

Update;
Now follower friendly!
author: nutjob51
